-	shop	HaS	90,2211:-1,2208:-1,2220:-1,2222:-1,5092:-1,5114:-1,2232:-1,5112:-1,2216:-1,2224:-1,2226:-1,2251:-1,2228:-1,2203:-1,2243:-1,2201:-1,2239:-1,2260:-1,2218:-1,2241:-1
-	shop	AcS	90,2627:-1,2601:-1,2605:-1,2603:-1,2602:-1,2604:-1,2608:-1


-	script	อาวุธและเครื่องป้องกัน::washop	-1,{
	mes "[Armor & Weapon]";
	mes "สวัสดีครับ ยินดีให้บริการครับ";
	mes "เลือกรายการที่คุณต้องการครับ";
	switch(select("-> Armor","-> Weapon")) {
		case 1:	switch(select("-> Headgear" , "-> Armor" , "-> Shield" , "-> Garment" , "-> Footgear" , "-> Accessory")) {
				case 1:	sleep2 100;	callshop "HaS",1;		break;
				case 2:	sleep2 100;	callshop "ArS",1;	break;
				case 3:	sleep2 100;	callshop "GuS",1;	break;
				case 4:	sleep2 100;	callshop "MuS",1;	break;
				case 5:	sleep2 100;	callshop "BoS",1;	break;
				case 6:	sleep2 100;	callshop "AcS",1;	break;
			}
			break;
		case 2:	switch(select("-> Swords" , "-> Rod & Staff & Maces" , "-> Bows" , "-> Daggers & Katars" , "-> Spears" , "-> Axes" , "-> Musical & Whips" , "-> Knuckles" , "-> Guns" , "-> Fuumas")) {
				case 1:	sleep2 100;	callshop "SwS",1;	break;
				case 2:	sleep2 100;	callshop "RoS",1;	break;
				case 3:	sleep2 100;	callshop "BosS",1;	break;
				case 4:	sleep2 100;	callshop "DaS",1;	break;
				case 5:	sleep2 100;	callshop "SpS",1;	break;
				case 6:	sleep2 100;	callshop "AxS",1;	break;
				case 7:	sleep2 100;	callshop "BaS",1;	break;
				case 8:	sleep2 100;	callshop "MoS",1;	break;
				case 9:	sleep2 100;	callshop "GusS",1;	break;
				case 10:	sleep2 100;	callshop "NiS",1;	break;
			}
			break;
	}

end;
}

c5,148,82,5	duplicate(washop)	Armor & Weapon#1	405
